issue.title: Allow add-ons without extensions to have resource messages

milestone.description: Enhancements and bug fixes expected to be included in a following main release.

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body: In line with #3734, allow add-ons without extensions to specify the file with resource messages, instead of requiring an "empty" extension (e.g. scanner add-ons, which in most of the cases have an extension just to load the resource messages).

issue.title: Allow add-ons to declare a helpset

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Add-ons can now declare a helpset through the manifest file:
```XML
<helpset localetoken="%LC%">com.example.help%LC%.helpset</helpset>
```
the locale token is used to indicate the places in the base name where a
locale might exist, for example, the above would match the following
files:
```
com/example/help/helpset.hs
com/example/help_es_ES/helpset_es_ES.hs
com/example/help_en_US/helpset_en_US.hs
```

The help of the add-on is dynamically added/removed to the main help
when the add-on is installed/uninstalled, ensuring the help of the
add-on is available whenever possible.

Fix #3734 - Allow add-ons without extensions to have help pages

issue.title: Update example ZapAddOn.xml with a helpset
issue.body:
Add example on how to declare a helpset.

Part of zaproxy/zaproxy#3734 - Allow add-ons without extensions to have
help pages

issue.title: Add tests for declared add-on resources

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Add tests to check that the bundle and helpset are properly loaded from
the manifest.

Part of #3734 and #3841.

body: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
